Articles.Content:
Hello, im searching a way for making planes/amphibious things

What mod or way do you recommen to make them go on the sea at somewhat decent speed without them exploding to death

Edited February 18, 2015 by elenir1

Well, there's the Better Buoyancy mod that helps with that sort of thing. I'm no expert in KSP boats, but from what I understand, the theory is that you float it on pieces that have high impact tolerances and buoyancy (air intakes, small gear bay, etc)....or you go really slow.
There's the Hooligan Labs mod for submarines, and Firespitter for pontoons and whatnot.

there's the Better Buoyancy mod that helps with that sort of thing

Indeed, it help a lot.

the theory is that you float it on pieces that have high impact tolerances and buoyancy

It's true, especial if you want to go fast or land a plane on water.

I don't know about the new SPP radial air intakes (didn't test them yet) but the original ones makes some great job look at this, it was a few version ago but shouldn't be to far from what it is now:

Also, firespitter have some seaplane part... never use them thought.

Okay

thanks all who replied now its time to figure out how to put it on answered and we will be fine

Okay

thanks all who replied now its time to figure out how to put it on answered and we will be fine

Edit your post, click "Go Advanced". At the top, you should be able to change the prefix.

Edit your post, click "Go Advanced". At the top, you should be able to change the prefix.

Thank you good sir
